languages.text: "{name}, некоторые считают, что нас связывает что-то кроме службы. Разумеется, это не так: я не желаю тебя позорить, объяви всем, кто тебе дорог, а кто — лишь слуга".

"{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."
languages.original_text: "{name}, некоторые считают, что нас связывает что-то кроме службы. Разумеется, это не так: я не желаю тебя позорить, объяви всем, кто тебе дорог, а кто — лишь слуга".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."

"{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."

"{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."

"{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."

languages.text: "{name}, einige Leute denken, dass uns mehr als die Pflicht verbindet. Das ist natürlich nicht wahr. Ich will Euch nicht in Verlegenheit bringen. Erklärt allen, wer Euch am Herzen liegt, und wer nur ein Diener ist."
languages.original_text: "{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, einige Leute denken, dass uns mehr als die Pflicht verbindet. Das ist natürlich nicht wahr. Ich will Euch nicht in Verlegenheit bringen. Erklärt allen, wer Euch am Herzen liegt, und wer nur ein Diener ist."

languages.text: « {name}, certains pensent que nous entretenons une relation qui dépasse le cadre du service, mais il va de soi que ces assertions sont fausses. Comme je ne souhaite pas vous discréditer, je vous prie de déclarer à toutes les personnes présentes qui est cher à votre cœur et qui est un simple serviteur. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, certains pensent que nous entretenons une relation qui dépasse le cadre du service, mais il va de soi que ces assertions sont fausses. Comme je ne souhaite pas vous discréditer, je vous prie de déclarer à toutes les personnes présentes qui est cher à votre cœur et qui est un simple serviteur. »

languages.text: 「{name}、私たちの間には任務以外の何かが絆となっていると考える者たちもいます。もちろん、それは事実ではありません。私はあなたの評判を落としたくはないのです。誰があなたにとって大切な存在で、誰がただの従僕なのか、皆に明言していただきたい」
languages.original_text: "{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、私たちの間には任務以外の何かが絆となっていると考える者たちもいます。もちろん、それは事実ではありません。私はあなたの評判を落としたくはないのです。誰があなたにとって大切な存在で、誰がただの従僕なのか、皆に明言していただきたい」

languages.text: «{name}, hay quienes afirman que hay entre nosotros algo más allá del servicio. Por supuesto, no es cierto. No quiero desmerecerl{mf|o|a}: declare ante todos por quién siente algo y quién no es más que su sirviente».
languages.original_text: "{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."

traits.locale_text: «{name}, hay quienes afirman que hay entre nosotros algo más allá del servicio. Por supuesto, no es cierto. No quiero desmerecerl{mf|o|a}: declare ante todos por quién siente algo y quién no es más que su sirviente».

languages.text: “{name}，有些人认为我们并不是出于职责才走到一起的。当然，这些话都是无稽之谈，我不希望这些谣言威胁到你的名誉。把真相公之于众吧，让大家都知道谁是你亲近的人，而谁仅仅是仆人而已。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，有些人认为我们并不是出于职责才走到一起的。当然，这些话都是无稽之谈，我不希望这些谣言威胁到你的名誉。把真相公之于众吧，让大家都知道谁是你亲近的人，而谁仅仅是仆人而已。”

languages.text: "{name}, aramızdaki bağın hizmet bağından ibaret olmadığına inananlar var. Elbette bu doğru değil. Küçük düşmeni istemiyorum... Kimin değerli olduğunu, kimin yalnızca hizmetkâr olduğunu herkese açıklamalısın."
languages.original_text: "{name}, some people think that something other than service binds us together. Of course, that's not true. I do not wish to bring discredit upon you: declare to all who is dear to you and who is only a servant."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, aramızdaki bağın hizmet bağından ibaret olmadığına inananlar var. Elbette bu doğru değil. Küçük düşmeni istemiyorum... Kimin değerli olduğunu, kimin yalnızca hizmetkâr olduğunu herkese açıklamalısın."
